metadata.name: CalendarProps
metadata.description: A type alias that represents the props for the Calendar component. It extends React.ComponentProps<typeof DayPicker>, inheriting all props from the react-day-picker DayPicker component. This allows the Calendar component to accept all props that the DayPicker component accepts.

definition.name: Calendar
definition.description: A customizable calendar component that wraps the react-day-picker DayPicker component with pre-styled UI elements and custom navigation icons. It provides a consistent look and feel while maintaining all the functionality of the underlying DayPicker.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the calendar container

classNames.description: Custom class names for various calendar elements

showOutsideDays.description: Whether to show days from the previous/next months

mode.description: The selection mode of the calendar

definition.visualLayout:
The calendar is displayed as a grid of days with navigation buttons at the top. It includes:
- A header with month/year display and navigation arrows
- A row of weekday labels
- A grid of date cells
- Custom styling for today, selected dates, range selection, and disabled dates
- Responsive layout that adjusts for different screen sizes
interactions: Click on dates to select them
Click navigation arrows to move between months
Range selection when in range mode
